view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.View

  • public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the core of the User Interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.swing.JLabel clock
      Clock is actually the timer that counts the time of a task.
      private javax.swing.JFrame frame
      This is the main frame.
      private javax.swing.JCheckBox fromDateCheckBox
      This is the checkbox used to enable the "from" filter for the report.
      private com.github.lgooddatepicker.components.DateTimePicker fromDateTimePicker
      This is the date and time picker used to filter the tasks while generating the report.
      private javax.swing.JButton generateReport
      This is the button used to generate the report.
      private javax.swing.JLabel now
      Since clock was the timer that counts the time of a task, the little clock with the current date and time is called now.
      private java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle
      This is the resource bundle for the languages.
      static java.lang.String SEGOE_UI_LIGHT
      This is the font used to display the objects to the user.
      private javax.swing.JButton start
      This is the button used to start the timer to count the time of a task.
      private javax.swing.JButton stop
      This is the button used to stop the timer to count the time of a task and used to save the tasks in the database and in the file.
      private javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel tableModel
      This is table model of the Daily.
      private javax.swing.JTextArea taskDescription
      This is the textarea for the description of the task.
      private javax.swing.JCheckBox toDateCheckBox
      This is the checkbox used to enable the "to" filter for the report.
      private com.github.lgooddatepicker.components.DateTimePicker toDateTimePicker
      This is the date and time picker used to filter the tasks while generating the report.

      This is the control panel which is the panel with the task description, start and stop button.

      This is the method used to get the button that generates the report.

      This method is used to create a new message for the user.

      This method gets the task description.

      This is the method used to get the "to" date and time filter for the report.
      private javax.swing.JPanel mainPanel()
      This main panel is actually the control panel (the panel with task description, start and stop button) and the Daily panel (the panel with all the tasks executed today).
      private javax.swing.JPanel reportPanel()
      This is the report panel which is the panel that contains the tasks filter and the button used to generate the report.
      void resetClock()
      This method resets the timer.
      private javax.swing.JPanel rootPanel()
      This is the root panel, it contains every graphical object.

      This method sets the look and feel of the program, it uses the system look and feel to make this program a little more fancy.

      This method sets the action listener of the start button.

      This method sets the action listener of the stop button.

      This method sets the task description.
      boolean toReportEnabled()
      This method returns a boolean representing the status of the checkbox of the "to" filter for the report.
      void welcomeMessage()
      This is the method that displays a nice welcome message to the user.

      • fromDateTimePicker

        private com.github.lgooddatepicker.components.DateTimePicker fromDateTimePicker
        This is the date and time picker used to filter the tasks while generating the report. This date and time picker refers to the beginning date and time. A special thanks goes to LGoodDatePicker and all its fantastic contributor for making this fantastic project. For more information about LGoodDatePicker, please visit their GitHub page.
        See Also:
        DateTimePicker

      • toDateTimePicker

        private com.github.lgooddatepicker.components.DateTimePicker toDateTimePicker
        This is the date and time picker used to filter the tasks while generating the report. This date and time picker refers to the end date and time. A special thanks goes to LGoodDatePicker and all its fantastic contributor for making this fantastic project. For more information about LGoodDatePicker, please visit their GitHub page.
        See Also:
        DateTimePicker

      • getFromDate

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getFromDate()
        This is the method used to get the "from" date and time filter for the report. A special thanks goes to LGoodDatePicker and all its fantastic contributor for making this fantastic project. For more information about LGoodDatePicker, please visit their GitHub page.
        Returns:
        the "from" date and time filter for the report
        See Also:
        DateTimePicker, LocalDateTime

      • getToDate

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getToDate()
        This is the method used to get the "to" date and time filter for the report. A special thanks goes to LGoodDatePicker and all its fantastic contributor for making this fantastic project. For more information about LGoodDatePicker, please visit their GitHub page.
        Returns:
        the "to" date and time filter for the report
        See Also:
        DateTimePicker, LocalDateTime
